author: dreiss
msg: THRIFT-64. java: Allow TServerSocket to bind to a specific IP address
Add a new constructor to TServerSocket that accepts an InetSocketAddress
and binds to that address.  Define the old constructor (which just takes
a port) in terms of the new one.

author: jstrachan
msg: changed ZNodeName to sort by sequence number first, for easier support of things like shared locks
